backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing contact details and lead forms with queries for reading leads and a mutation to submit new ones.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking footer branding updates to related components, files, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend components and their roles in the King Kingdom site.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode values, and base element styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading fonts, icons, metadata, and the React app entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout composing all King Kingdom sections along with header, footer, and floating WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/con: Displays a list of phone numbers from CONTACT_INFO with optional icon and separator.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Fea: Reusable wrapper that renders a Lucide icon inside a styled gradient container.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Flo: Fixed WhatsApp action button linking to the configured WhatsApp URL.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Foo: Footer displaying CCS logo, branding text, description, quick links, and social icons with smooth-scroll handling.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Gal: Dialog-based image lightbox with close button and centered responsive image display.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Hea: Sticky responsive header with logo, navigation links, call/WhatsApp CTAs, and mobile menu behavior.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/sec: Section describing the company, its mission, values, and construction services.
Displays a photo gallery with lightbox functionality for construction project images.
Contact form and company details section using validation and WhatsApp submission.
Hero banner describing services and offering buttons to scroll to contact or portfolio.
Highlights key service features like quality, team skill, and on-time delivery.
Shows a grid of project cards with images, titles, and locations.
Outlines the construction workflow in six steps from contact to handover.
Renders a services grid showcasing construction-related offerings with icons, titles, and descriptions.
Displays a list of reasons to choose the company, each with an icon, title, and description in a styled grid.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Top: Renders a top bar with phone numbers, WhatsApp, email, hours, and address pulled from CONTACT_INFO.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Defines centralized contact details including phones, WhatsApp, email, address, and business hours.
frontend/src/config/socialLinks.ts: Provides social media link configurations and a helper to return only active links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, component classes, and utility extensions for the site's design system.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Builds WhatsApp message URLs and opens them using contact configuration.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, providing query and identity providers before rendering the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, including colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, and pending feature requests for project tracking.
